name: Elko Credenza Small-Bamboo
description:
Perfect for smaller spaces.  Although compact, the Elko Credenza small will still hold an insane amount of media equipment, books, clothes, dishes, art supplies--you get the idea.  The powder coated steel base is complemented by the warmth of the solid wood cabinet. With 6 base color options, you can customize this piece to make it a perfect fit for your office or living space. The exterior is built using reinforced mitered joinery and the two solid wood doors are grain matched, and roll open with smooth sliding hardware. The interior has adjustable shelves and wire management portals that allow for numerous media configurations.  The Elko Credenza is finished with a durable, washable clear lacquer. Solid wood. Made in Minnesota.

-Also available in Walnut and White Oak
-Free White Glove Shipping
-Designer and trade discounts available
-3 to 5 week lead time
-Assembly Required: Bases are flat-packed, but attach easily with supplied bolts, doors clip in place, shelves install with adjustable shelf pins (included)
-Exterior dimensions: 45” long x 17” wide x 24” tall (base 10” tall)
-Interior dimensions:  2 sections each 21” wide x 12 ½” tall x 14” deep
-Accommodates media equipment wiring
-Ask about dimension changes (custom fees apply)
-Rush orders available upon request (fees apply)
-All of our authentic, heirloom quality furniture comes with an exclusive Eastvold Furniture tag, listing your name and the date your piece was finished.

name: Classic Credenza
description:
This is NOT your grandma’s credenza.  It’s better.  Much better.  Our Classic Credenza may look like an iconic mid-century piece, but this one is equipped with the modern conveniences you expect from media storage.  The Classic Credenza is built with reinforced mitered joints, which allow the wood grain to wrap around the piece in one fluid sweep, showcasing the beauty of the locally-harvested, solid wood.  The solid wood doors are grain matched and roll open with smooth sliding hardware.  The interior has adjustable shelves and wire management portals that allow for unlimited media configurations.  The Classic Credenza is finished with a durable, clear lacquer that will hold up to your sweatiest cocktails.  Because let’s face it, no one has the time to mess with polishing furniture anymore, not even grandma.  Solid wood.  Made in Minnesota.

-Available in Walnut or White Oak
-Free White Glove Shipping
-Designer and trade discounts available
-3 to 5 week lead time
-Assembly Required: legs easily attach using pre-threaded inserts, doors clip in place, shelves install with adjustable shelf pins (included)
-Dimensions: 66" wide x 24" tall x 20" deep
-Interior: 2 sections each 32” wide x 18 ½” tall x 17” deep
-Accommodates media equipment wiring
-Ask about dimension changes (custom fees apply)
-Rush orders available upon request (fees apply)
-All of our authentic, heirloom quality furniture comes with an exclusive Eastvold Furniture tag, listing your name and the date your piece was finished.

name: Alden Dining Table
description:
This dining table is as beautiful as it is practical.  The Alden Dining Table is handcrafted from solid wood and finished with a durable, washable clear lacquer finish that is impervious to water and stains.  Warm and elegant on its own, or paired with the Alden Sideboard, this table will be the centerpiece of your home (or office). The subtle back-beveled top and splayed legs give lightness to this sturdy piece. The Alden Dining Table can accommodate 8 people for meals, games or meetings.  But one thing is certain--no matter where you use it, or who is sitting at it, you’ll likely be talking about IT.  Solid wood.  Made in Minnesota.

-Available in Walnut or White Oak
-Free White Glove Shipping
-Designer and trade discounts available
-3 to 5 week lead time
-Assembly Required: legs attach using pre-threaded inserts, bolts and wrench included

name: Classic Coffee Table
description:
Sleek, modern, classic. Yes, yes, and yes.  As the name implies, this timeless piece is heavily influenced by mid-century design, but with a modern twist.  Reinforced mitered joints allow the wood grain to wrap around the piece in one fluid sweep, showcasing the beauty of the locally-harvested, solid wood.  Because we know a coffee table has to hold up to more than your cup of coffee, the table is finished with a durable, clear lacquer, making it worry free for everyday use.  Need another reason to love the Classic Coffee Table?  The hand-turned legs come in two height options, making this piece perfect for a range of spaces.  The Classic Coffee Table pairs with our Classic Credenza and our new Classic Side Table.  Due to their timeless simplicity, the Classic Series complements both contemporary or more traditional  interiors.  Solid wood.  Made in Minnesota.  

-Available in Walnut or White Oak
-Free Fed Ex or UPS Shipping
-Designer and trade discounts available
-3 to 5 week lead time
-Assembly Required: legs easily attach using pre-threaded inserts 
-Dimensions: Box: 45” long x 17” wide x 6” tall  (Legs: 9” or 12” tall)  
-Ask about dimension changes (custom fees apply)
-Rush orders available upon request (fees apply)

name: Classic Side Table
description:
You asked for it.  Due to high customer and designer demand, we have added the Classic Side Table to our Classic Series.  Following the clean, simple lines of our Classic Coffee Table, the Classic Side Table is extremely functional and versatile.  The thoughtful proportions of this honest side table make it perfect for pairing with the Classic Coffee Table in your living room or as a nightstand in your bedroom.  In fact, we bet you could find a use for this hard-working little table in just about any room of the house.  Reinforced mitered joints allow the wood grain to wrap around the entire piece.  The table is finished with a durable clear lacquer, making it worry free and useful for everyday spaces.  The Classic Side Table comes in two height options to accommodate various sofas and beds.  Solid wood.  Made in Minnesota.

-Available in Walnut or White Oak
-Free Fed Ex or UPS Shipping
-Designer and trade discounts available
-3 to 5 week lead time

name: Alden Side Board
description:
This warm and elegant sideboard has become a new customer favorite.  The richness of the wood grain is the stand out here.  We have allowed the grain to run seamlessly across the door and drawer fronts and designed it with integrated handles to let the wood speak for itself.  The Alden Sideboard has a back beveled, solid wood top that keeps this substantial piece from feeling too heavy.  Adding to this lightness, the Alden Sideboard floats on the airy, splayed legs.  Whether using it for traditional storage needs or to conceal your high tech media equipment, the Alden Sideboard is sure to please. The interior is equipped with wire passages, adjustable shelves, solid maple, dovetailed drawer boxes with soft-close drawer slides, and hidden door hinges.  Pairs with the Alden Dining Table.  Solid wood.  Made in Minnesota

-Available in Walnut or White Oak
-Free White Glove Shipping
-Designer and trade discounts available
-3 to 5 week lead time
-Assembly Required: legs attach using pre-threaded inserts, bolts and wrench included, shelves install with adjustable shelf pins (included)
-Dimensions: 84” long x 20” deep x 27” tall
-Interior:  2 swinging doors (inside dimension: 22” wide x 17” deep x 17 ½” tall); 3 drawers (inside dimensions each: 34” wide x 15” deep x 4 ½” tall)
-Accommodates media equipment wiring
-Ask about dimension changes (custom fees apply)
-Rush orders available upon request (fees apply)

name: Jackson Dresser
description:
The Jackson Dresser has ample storage for clothing and features 5 deep drawers with soft close slides so you won’t wake your sleeping beauty.  It is built using Walnut veneer applied over solid birch plywood with exposed and beveled edges to highlight this construction.  The Jackson Dresser sits off the ground on 4 square brushed steel legs.  It is both stylish and practical and pairs with our Jackson Bed and Jackson Nightstand.  Made in Minnesota.

-Available in Walnut
-Free white glove Shipping
-Designer and trade discounts available
-3 to 5 week lead time
-Dimensions:  48" tall x 28" wide x 19" deep
-5 soft close drawers, top bevel handle detail; drawer interior dimensions: 25” wide x 15” deep x 7” tall
-Assembly required: attach legs with supplied bolts
-Rush orders available upon request (fees apply)
-All of our authentic, heirloom quality furniture comes with an exclusive Eastvold Furniture tag, listing your name and the date your piece was finished.

name: Elko Coffee Table
description:
Blending modern fabrication and finishing techniques with timeless design, the Elko Coffee Table offers numerous color and wood options to satisfy a vast range of design tastes.  Whether you are looking for a pop of color or a more neutral palette, the Elko Coffee Table is a fun way to turn up the wow factor in your living room.  Starting with a steel base that is laser cut, welded, and powder coated in one of 6 colors, we then add a wood top of your choice.  For the box, we use reinforced mitered joints, which allow the wood grain to wrap around the piece in one fluid sweep.  We use only solid wood from locally harvested sources.  This is your table--literally, mix and match the base and wood options to come up with your own unique combination.  Accompanies the Elko Credenza.  Made in Minnesota.


-Available in Walnut, White Oak, Bamboo
-Base colors: white, silver, black, red, green, and blue
-3 to 5 week lead time
-Free Fed Ex or UPS Shipping
-Designer and trade discounts available
-Dimensions: 45" long x 17" wide x 16" tall (box: 6" tall, base: 10” tall)
-Ask about dimension changes (custom fees apply)
-Assembly required: Bases are flat-packed, but attach easily with supplied bolts
-Rush orders available upon request (fees apply)
-All of our authentic, heirloom quality furniture comes with an exclusive Eastvold Furniture tag, listing your name and the date your piece was finished.

name: Elko Credenza
description:
Classic with a twist.  While inspired by mid-century design, the metal base was born in the new millenium.  The sleek base is laser cut and powder coated in one of 6 color options.  The box is handcrafted of solid wood with reinforced mitered joints allowing the wood grain to wrap around the entire piece.  Behind the smooth sliding doors are adjustable shelves and wire passages that make it a simple and flexible place for all of your media needs, wired and unwired.  The Elko Credenza comes in 18 different combinations, making this piece highly customizable for your home, office or studio.  Made in Minnesota.  

-Available in Walnut, White Oak and Bamboo
-Free White Glove Shipping
-Designer and trade discounts available
-3-5 week lead time
-Assembly required: Bases are flat-packed, but attach easily with supplied bolts, doors clip in place, shelves install with adjustable shelf pins (included)
-Dimensions: 66" wide x 27" tall x 20"deep (base 7” tall)
-Interior divided into two sections each 32” wide x 18 ½” tall x 17” deep
-Accommodates media equipment wiring
-Ask about dimension changes (custom fees apply)
-Rush orders available upon request
-All of our authentic, heirloom quality furniture comes with an exclusive Eastvold Furniture tag, listing your name and the date your piece was finished.

name: Jackson Bed
description:
Originally designed as a kid’s bed with ample storage, this bed is much too stylish to be relegated to your kids’ room.  It’s sleek design incorporates push-touch latches on the roomy drawers.  The Jackson Bed is built using Walnut veneer applied over solid birch plywood with exposed,  beveled edges to highlight this construction.  The platform bed is elevated off the ground on square brushed steel legs.  The twin bed has storage on only one side, and can be placed in either direction.  The full, queen and king all feature 3 drawers on each side.  Designed to pair with the Jackson Nightstand and compliments the Jackson Dresser.  Made in Minnesota

-Available in Walnut
-Free White Glove Shipping
-Designer and trade discounts available
-3 to 5 week lead time
-3 drawers on each side (twin has drawers on only one side)
-Assembly Required: Bed ships in two pieces split down the middle length-wise, assemble 2 pieces with supplied bolts; legs attach with supplied bolts, wrench included.  Drawers come installed.  
-Dimensions:
Twin: 77” long x 43” wide x 14” tall
Full: 77" long x 58" wide x 14" tall
Queen: 82” long x 62” wide x 14” tall
King: 82” long x 80” wide x 14” tall  
California King: 86” long x 76” wide x 14” tall
-Rush orders available upon request (fees apply)
-All of our authentic, heirloom quality furniture comes with an exclusive Eastvold Furniture tag, listing your name and the date your piece was finished.

name: Jackson Night Stand
description:
Designed to accompany the Jackson Bed, this compact night stand hangs effortlessly on the wall, making less hiding spots for those bedroom dust bunnies.  The Jackson Night Stand is built using Walnut veneer applied over solid birch plywood with exposed and beveled edges to highlight this construction.  The stylish design features a drawer and an open cubby, but we won’t ask what’s in yours.  Made in Minnesota.

name: Plastolux Cube Side Table
description:
Designed by Tyler Goodro of Plastolux, this compact night stand has a light airy feel with plenty of storage.  The Plastolux Cube Side Table is built using solid wood, powder coated steel and durable soft-close drawer slides. The stylish design features a drawer and an open cubby to help you keep things looking tidy.

Design - Tyler Goodro
Dimensions - 18"W x 22"T x 18"D
Wood Options - Solid Walnut or White Oak with Blumotion Soft Close drawer.
Base Color Options - Silver, Black, White, Red, Blue, Green
Made in - Minnesota by Eastvold, USA, 3 to 5 week lead time.
Assembly - No Assembly
Shipping - Free shipping within the US
